name: ORD_NLP_VERIF_LUNG_RECOM
description: This table contains information about lung screening recommendations that were present on orders when the output from a natural language processing model to extract lung screening information was verified or last modified.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RECOMMENDATION_FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the recommendation finding record associated with this recommendation information.

columns.name: SX_PROG_REC_C_NAME
columns.description: The screening program recommendation category ID.
